review:
We would highly recommend this family run restaurant. The food is so delicious and they are very passionate about every dish especially the seafood which is amazing. I read the reviews before our holiday and it lived up to all our expectations. We tried many...dishes and the rice and noddle dishes along with the Seafood platter and grilled fish were our favourites.Amazing food and such lovely owners.
Julie & Phi dishes and the rice and noddle dishes along with the Seafood platter and grilled fish were our favourites.Amazing food and such lovely owners.
Julie & Philip

Very glad we found this gem.The food was excellent whether breakfast lunch or dinner good full menu with many vegetarian options.Staff were all lovely ,very friendly and helpful. Prices very reasonable. Can highly recommend and look forward to next time
This restaurant has good genuine food. The chef cooks amazing and the owners are so kind and welcoming. Highly recommend this restaurant.

Delicious dishes!! My husband ordered chicken curry, I ordered noodles with prawns. The food was delicious and tastefully prepared, something I have not had before in a week and a half in Sri Lanka. It was also well proportioned. The fresh fruit juices were also...very good with lots of fruit. Furthermore, the atmosphere was nice with nice music and very friendly owners. Price-quality is also good. Highly recommended!! very good with lots of fruit. Furthermore, the atmosphere was nice with nice music and very friendly owners. Price-quality is also good. Highly recommended!!

Ôøº
the best restaurant in trinco by a Mile. Fresh fish, good currys and a amazing owner and place. We had such a good time. Must go, recommend for sure!

One of the three worst restaurants we visited in a month of eating out two or three times a day. We waited almost three hours for two simple meals and an icecream with fruit for our son. The fried noodle dish was just instant noodles...with a little onion and carrot and my fried rice with fish was so dry it was inedible. They couldn't even get the order for my son right, he was served just fruit. Our one drink was long gone during the wait, but we couldn't get anyone's attention for another. Horribly expensive for such terrible quali with a little onion and carrot and my fried rice with fish was so dry it was inedible. They couldn't even get the order for my son right, he was served just fruit. Our one drink was long gone during the wait, but we couldn't get anyone's attention for another. Horribly expensive for such terrible quality.

The restaurant has a beachy vibe and the food was delicious but I did expect more based on the good reviews:
We were sat at a table but the chairs were too short which made it somewhat uncomfortable. We got to see the fresh fish...we ended up ordering and it tasted great. But the side dishes came in very small portion. Some of the staff spoke very bad English and we had trouble ordering a fruit juice (which I also think they don‚Äôt offer at night, but is stated nowher we ended up ordering and it tasted great. But the side dishes came in very small portion. Some of the staff spoke very bad English and we had trouble ordering a fruit juice (which I also think they don‚Äôt offer at night, but is stated nowhere).

We tried a bit of everything today, fried calamari, fried whole fish, vegetable nasi goreng and chicken curry, but despite very friendly service the cook didn‚Äôt really impress. 
Additionally the beers and our water were not cold. The mango lassi on the other hand was...excelle excellent.

Very nice staff but very slow service. My husband has fish (about 4500 so expensive for SR) which he thought was excellent but I had chicken noodles (which lacked flavour) and son had chicken kothu which also wasn't as good as other places and small...portion size.

Not sure we would come back there as lots of other restaurants to choose fr portion size.

Not sure we would come back there as lots of other restaurants to choose from.
Great restaurant, relaxing vibes and really Tasty seafood. A lot of choice between rice, noodles and Potato dishes

At the first day of our trip to Trincomaly, we‚Äôve been searching for nice place to take seafood.
Be cool is very cosy place. Many customers. Good music. Nice ambience. 
But the main advantage is food. Seafood. Grilled seafood. üòÅ
Fish, prawns, squid. We ate...everythi everything.
wow! what a fantastic meal we had here. the choice and awesome flavours were second to none. would defiantly recommend this restaurant.
Very tasty breakfast, try the coconut roti with dahl and sambol! The hosts are friendly and always willing to helpMore
We had a lovely diner at this restaurant. Really good quality and price. The owners want to give you a great evening. The food was really tasty and delicous. Came back the next dayMore
Once you find this restaurant you will keep coming back. Jumbo prawns in a homemade BBQ sauce is the signature dish. Wifi is a bonus. Very friendly welcome.More

We were planning for a walk from Trinco to hot water springs, just passing by a nice restaurant with very friendly staff. We had a nice conversation it took that long so we decided to take a lunch. It was very great, tasteful!! With many...mushrooms and tuna inside. We can have a look in the kitchen and only natural ingredients are used in the meal. That's what we like. A local restaurant with natural Sri Lankan herbs and vegetables. We would recommend it to everyone who have a warm heart to the Sri Lankan peop mushrooms and tuna inside. We can have a look in the kitchen and only natural ingredients are used in the meal. That's what we like. A local restaurant with natural Sri Lankan herbs and vegetables. We would recommend it to everyone who have a warm heart to the Sri Lankan people.
We took the seafood platter and it was delicious, Fresh and super tasty! The stuff is very friendly and nice! Strongly recommended
Realy delicous...so tasty.. Kalum is the best cook of the world. The crew is very friendly and helpful. Everbody has to come to test the fresh seafood...

I feel conflicted because maybe I ordered poorly but I cant say this is the best meal. In fact, it's probably the worst meal I've had in Sri Lanka so far.
We arrived to a basically empty restaurant, a friendly welcome and quick service.
We...ordered vegetable curry and rice, chicken chop suey and chips.
Where do I start... Chips came first, before the drinks and other meals. They were fine - you honestly can't go wrong with French fries. Next the drinks - tasty and cold and enough alcohol that it felt almost worth the money. Almost. 
The rest didn't go so well. The vegetable curry was a very odd (albeit local!) type of vegetable that I'd never come across, looked like a potato but couldn't put a fork in it and tasted like tough banana, or maybe a really tough potato like one that had been cooked twice then reheated in a microwave? Either way it was honestly the worst vegetable I've ever tried. The rice was cold. Like, cold enough that even flies weren't bothered by it cause there was literally no heat. Nope. Dahl was good. Potato thing was okay. That coconut sambal thing was dry and soggy.
My partner ordered chicken chop suey and there was no flavour AT ALL. Maybe his error, ordering an East Asian dish in a South Asian restaurant. There was also no chicken at all - just pure bones. Not great. 
In the waiters defence, he did offer us anything else off the menu for free, or extra Dahl. I declined based on those 2 dishes I wasn't prepared to put my stomach through another one.
Paid our most expensive bill of our trip so far and left... Won't be back. Don't recommend the food. 
Staff friendly enough and he did apologize a lot. Probably a great place for drinks with friends or their fresh seafo ordered vegetable curry and rice, chicken chop suey and chips.

Staff friendly enough and he did apologize a lot. Probably a great place for drinks with friends or their fresh seafood.

I really enjoyed the food, atmosphere and people at the cafe. Surprised by previous reviews about price, as I found it to be reasonable and on par with the rest of the seafood place around. Very tasty red snapper. Maybe this place is for a...more laid back travell more laid back traveller.

Seems ok from the outside, but is really to avoid.
Overpriced and provided a bad service, when we were the only customers.
Seemed more like tourist scam.

Avoid this place unless you enjoy eating a pricy meal in the dark and spend the night on the toilet seat (me) or throwing up (my girlfriend).
From the other reviews (read after the disaster, unfortunately), the only reason we ate at the same time...is because we shared the same dish.
To be fair, the sauce of the seafood platter was however very tasty. Not worth the sickness, thou is because we shared the same dish.
To be fair, the sauce of the seafood platter was however very tasty. Not worth the sickness, though.

I had some grilled fish and it was fresh and cooked perfectly .
Also stayed there for the night and had a great vibe and great music. 
Highly recomend

Delicious! Absolutely delicious. I first tried the crab curry here last year and couldn‚Äôt stop thinking about it. Came back again this year and this is what I first wanted when I arrive. Crab curry everyday ! They even showed me the way they cooked...it! Friendly staff t it! Friendly staff too!
Great food. Great service! 100% would recommend. Food was fresh and very flsvoursome. Staff were friendly and welcoming.

We ate here twice on our recent trip. Once for dinner with our friends which was very good and then breakfast the next day.  Our host Charma was the chef and made all the food from scratch while we waited. Very good local cuisine and...a good selection of very fresh seafood. 
Reggae inspired decor over water set back from the beach.
A few mosquitoes so make sure you‚Äôve got spray on it with y a good selection of very fresh seafood. 
Reggae inspired decor over water set back from the beach.
A few mosquitoes so make sure you‚Äôve got spray on it with you.
Staff was very friendly and we had a really good grilled fish. Like the ambiance of the place. A little bit above average for the area.

Went on recommendation and checked on lonely planet review. However, the Ramshackle appearance was matched by food quality. Prawn curry resulted in overnight ‚Äútrots‚Äù and the fish served up with ‚Äúlemon/garlic sauce‚Äùwas unrecognisable from the one chosen. Service not brilliant and we were the only...ones there - a Tuesday slightly out of season. If that wasn‚Äôt bad enough the price certainly was. 4000 for a medium sized snapper and 9000 total for three. It‚Äôs a rip off - high end hotel restaurant prices are cheaper. I had to dinner with my friends in this place CSC resturant .. Food is also good & verry tastey ,, Thank you for the giving wonderful dinner  ,,,

Went here a few times as served the best cocktails in Trincomalee. The food was equally amazing each time we had it and the staff were truly amazing, really friendly and wellcoming. We met friends who worked here who we wil stay in touch with.thanks...Winston and co we will be ba Winston and co we will be back.

To my taste this was not the best meal we've had in Sri Lanka. The Coconut Roti and Coconut Sambol were good, especially the Sambol, but the Prawn Chop suey was not the best. The prawns were small, pealed prawns, which looked like the frozen...ones straight out of the supermarket, they had little or no taste. The vegetables were wishy washy and overcooked and again may have been frozen. All in all a disappointing me ones straight out of the supermarket, they had little or no taste. The vegetables were wishy washy and overcooked and again may have been frozen. All in all a disappointing meal.

We went tonight and the food was excellent, decent portions too. Son had pizza which was really good.

Would come back definitely
I have ordered the grilled fish and fish shopsui and some extra dishes and I was amazed from the first bite food was amazing loved every single bit of it üëå

I went to this restaurant with my family.  The quality of the food was incredible.  The food and other things are good and the prices are very good and the staff are very kind and take care of me. It is very good. I recommend...this restaurant to others. I hope to share my experience with othe this restaurant to others. I hope to share my experience with others.

We stopped by to have a lunch on our way back from the beach. Even though, we were the only visitors, they prepared a nice and tasty meal for us. Fish curry was amazing and tasty sweet panecakes with coconut

Best place to eat we‚Äôve found in Trincomalee and one of the best in the whole journey in Sri Lanka. We had grilled tuna and grilled tiger shrimps and both were amazing, properly cooked and served with freshly made sauces. The cook is very friendly...and interested in the opinions of the customers. Totally advis and interested in the opinions of the customers. Totally advised!

Very nice people working in the restaurant and delicious food. If you are, like me, missing a fresh salad in this country, definitely order the mixed salad as a side! Platter full of fresh veggies and fruits.

We came off-season, around 7 o'clock pm and the staff was still so nice to prepare different curries and fried rice for us. The mother is an amazing cook even our friend who is from Sri Lanka said that the food is very good. So...far this was the best fish curry and fried rice! Would recommend to anyone, even those who prefer western food as they make it very good as we far this was the best fish curry and fried rice! Would recommend to anyone, even those who prefer western food as they make it very good as well.

We had our dinner here at different occasions and were never disapointed. It's a seafood restaurant, but they alsof serve a great vegetarian curry and birijani and have very friendly staff! They also were helpfull to inform us about the dishes our son could have...(he has a cowmilk and eggs allergy). We felt very welco (he has a cowmilk and eggs allergy). We felt very welcome!

we ate there with our family of 8. very good food and super nice staff. can recommand it to everyone.

Absolutely love this place !!!! 
Great food, fantastic staff, excellent service, nice ambience, relaxing atmosphere and food presentation. Been here so many times, never been let down. Keep up the great work guys!! 5 stars***** highly recommend to anyone who has not tried.
It's a wonderful place near Road on the way to nilaveli the service is wonderful food was excellent delicious very friendly service very clean
